clean_laptop_base.description: Clean the laptop base to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_screen.description: Clean the laptop's screen to remove dust, fingerprints or smudges.

open_screen.description: Open the laptop's screen by pivoting it on its hinge to the open position.

close_screen.description: Close the laptop's screen by pivoting it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_whole_laptop.description: Clean the entire laptop, including the base and the screen.
